artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Akiyama Buemon; Carver: Yamamoto Shinji
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 478.97; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 277.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: one sheet; seated wolf with its head bending over its back, with a very long, thin snout; wolf is seated at water's edge, with a reflection in LRC; full moon, ULQ
markings: Artist’s seal: 芳年 {Yoshitoshi} | Carver’s seal: 山本刀 {Yamamoto tō}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From One Hundred Aspects of the Moon (Tsuki hyakushi 月百姿)
title: Moon over Musashi Plain
